Name: The Secret of Rooms
About the game: 'the Secret of Rooms' is a drama-oriented puzzle-solving game in a modern setting. [Gameplay] You wake up at the door of a strange room and get a phone call from your boss, urging you to investigate the disappearance of a female reporter that has caused a sensation in the city. During the investigation, you are in a bizarre room cycle. In a room with distinctive human characteristics, look for clues, crack the secret room, restore the story that happened to them.Eventually, the world thread reveals the creepy secrets. Just after you think you find the truth, the unexpected reversal happened...... Who exactly is the 'you' ——?
